overview: Mr. Curry joined Digital Development Partners in March 2010 as its Chief Marketing Officer. In 1999 Mr. Curry joined EFT Holdings Inc.. Mr. Curry became EFTâ€™s Corporate Secretary in 2007 and was added to their board of directors in 2009. Mr. Curry brings over forty (40) years of international trade and sales experience to Digital and its venture partner companies. Since the early 1990â€™s, Mr. Curry has been involved in the manufacturing and international marketing of various beauty and healthcare related products that focus on vibrancy and longevity. This experience has proven invaluable to the growth and success of both EFT and Digital. Mr. Curryâ€™s extensive international trade experience also includes the import and export of high-end bicycles along with a very successful career importing high-end automobiles. Mr. Curry is a graduate of North Texas State University and is a former Olympic ranked cyclist.
